thread.title: PHOTOS: Your Best Black-and-White Shots from Instagram
thread.title_full: PHOTOS: Your Best Black-and-White Shots from Instagram

title: PHOTOS: Your Best Black-and-White Shots from Instagram
text:
PHOTOS: Your Best Black-and-White Shots from Instagram By Ben Fractenberg | October 14, 2015 6:46pm Twitter Facebook Email More 
As summer gave way to fall, we wanted to feature some of your best black-and-white photos from around the city 
Shown below are some of our favorite shots from the Instagram accounts of DNAinfo and photographer Ben Fractenberg . 
If you'd like to contribute your own photos, tag your Instagram pics with @dnainfonyc and the hash #bwnyc. Don't forget to tell us where they were taken! Statue of Liberty A photo posted by @fractenberg on Oct 6, 2015 at 6:24am PDT DNAinfo/Ben Fractenberg 
A man looks over the Statue of Liberty from the Staten Island Ferry. Legos A photo posted by DNAinfo.com (@dnainfonyc) on Sep 30, 2015 at 1:10pm PDT DNAinfo/Ben Fractenberg 
A woman plays with an interactive Lego sculpture on the High Line. Bird on a Wire A photo posted by DNAinfo.com (@dnainfonyc) on Oct 12, 2015 at 2:28pm PDT @noticiasdehugo 
A pigeon enjoys a perch with city views. Headset A photo posted by DNAinfo.com (@dnainfonyc) on Sep 26, 2015 at 3:11pm PDT @noticiasdehugo 
A woman multitasks in Harlem. Smoke Break A photo posted by DNAinfo.com (@dnainfonyc) on Sep 24, 2015 at 9:09am PDT DNAinfo/Ben Fractenberg 
A man takes a smoke break amid the hustle and bustle of Times Square. Queens Park Life A photo posted by DNAinfo.com (@dnainfonyc) on Oct 13, 2015 at 4:35pm PDT @pepper718 
An idyllic walk in Flushing Meadows-Corona Park. Chelsea Ghost A photo posted by DNAinfo.com (@dnainfonyc) on Oct 6, 2015 at 3:51pm PDT DNAinfo/Ben Fractenberg 
A man creates an eerie moment in Chelsea. Rockaway Beach A photo posted by DNAinfo.com (@dnainfonyc) on Sep 23, 2015 at 1:11pm PDT @grilloinrock 
Summer's last hurrah on Rockaway Beach. High Line A photo posted by DNAinfo.com (@dnainfonyc) on Sep 22, 2015 at 10:20am PDT DNAinfo/Ben Fractenberg 
A bird's-eye view from the High Line. Heaven Above A photo posted by @fractenberg on Sep 30, 2015 at 2:30pm PDT DNAinfo/Ben Fractenberg
